title: Simone Biles Withdraws / Women's All- Around Preview / Analysis and Reaction
description:
We hear from Simone Biles who spoke with stunning honesty at a news conference following her withdrawal from the team event. Since then, she announced that she isn't going defend her all-around Olympic title. Reporter and gymnastics expert Scott Bregman gives us his analysis and reaction from Tokyo. Plus, super heavyweight boxer Frazer Clarke of Great Britain talks about surviving a knife attack in 2016.


Full Frazer Clarke podcast: https://apps.olympicchannel.com/en/podcast/detail/podcast-champion-boxer-frazer-clarke/
